column5: There are four bedrooms in this spacious 5,665 sq foot building. The decor is warm and inviting with a Texas Ranch/East African mixed decor. Enjoy the views, pool and many common and outdoor living areas as we welcome you to the jewel of Asante. Located in the Texas Hill Country in Dripping Springs, Texas, Nyumba is a luxury site just recently completed in 2016. This location is perfectly suited for weddings, large family events, private weekend get-away's, or even corporate meetings.
column8: Nyumba House - Asante Lodging and Events
